description: An advanced version of the electronic cigarette.  A less harmful way to get your nicotine fix than regular cigarettes, but still addictive.  It needs batteries and nicotine liquid to function.

name: multi cooker
description: A professional-grade multi-cooker, with a battery slot for camping trips or tailgating.  Its multitude of settings and features promise to handle any sort of cooking, from parboiling potatoes to cooking curry to popping popcorn.  There's no manual, but you're sure you can work it out.

name: plastic fish trap
description: This is a makeshift fish trap made from plastic bottles.  It's simple, even primitive, but easy to use.  The principle of action: the fish swims inside for bait, but can't get out.  Not humane, prohibited by law, but there are no cops left to care.

name: E-Ink Tablet PC
description: A tablet PC using an efficient color e-ink display.  Before the cataclysm, these were nifty gadgets; now, it's an almost priceless resource.  Runs on conventional batteries.

name: camera
description: A point-and-shoot digital camera, with digital viewfinder, a backup 'iron-sight', and flash.  You can look at your photos on the digital screen, or transfer them with a memory card.  Takes conventional batteries.

name: camera pro
description: A 35mm digital SLR (single-lens reflex) camera, with optical and digital viewfinders, zoom lens with auto-focus and stabilizer, and flash.  You can view your photos on it or transfer them with a memory card; it runs on conventional batteries.  Before the cataclysm, you could have taken professional-grade photos using this.

name: electronic handcuffs
description:
A pair of electronic handcuffs, used by police and riot bots to detain captives.  Their continuous siren clearly identifies the wearer as an arrested criminal and alerts human police.  Wait for their arrival, don't try to escape or to remove the cuffs - they will administer an electric shock.
However, since the only police likely to respond are undead, you may have a long wait ahead, unless you get creative...

name: radio pipe bomb
description: A radio-detonated pipe bomb.  Activate it to arm the detonator, then place somewhere and press a button on the radio control.

use_action.msg: You arm your radio-detonated pipe bomb.

name: activated radio pipe bomb
description: A radio-detonated pipe bomb, armed.  Place it or attach to a RC car, then get away and use the radio-control to detonate.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't disarm your %s'.  Place it, get away, and use the remote control to detonate.

name: radio dynamite
description: Dynamite with a radio detonator.  Activate it to arm, then plant or attach to a RC car, and use the remote detonator.

use_action.msg: You arm your radio-detonated dynamite.

name: activated radio dynamite
description: Dynamite with a radio detonator, armed.  Place it, get away and use the remote detonator.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You can't disarm your %s'.  Place it, get away and use the remote control to detonate.

name: Radio car box
description: A RC car, with radio-control and batteries included!  Disassemble to unpack and enjoy.

name: smart lamp (off)
description: This is a smart lamp, it can be activated remotely.

use_action.msg: You turn the smart lamp on.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The smart lamp batteries are dead.

name: smart lamp (on)
description: This is a smart lamp, this smart lamp is turned on.  It can be deactivated remotely.

use_action.msg: Your smart lamp turned off

name: RC car
description: A remote-controlled car.  Fun for young and old alike.

name: RC car (on)
description: This remote-controlled car is on, and draining its batteries just like a real electric car!  Use a remote control to drive it around.

name: RC control
description: A remote control for RC cars, with joystick to steer the car and colorful buttons that don't seem to do anything.  Perhaps they were for the deluxe model?

name: acetylene torch
description: A compact tool kit intended for welding and cutting metal, this portable oxyacetylene torch includes a torch handle, cutting attachment, and two pre-filled gas cylinders all in an easy-to-carry tote.  In addition to its metalworking uses, you can activate it in order to destroy metal barriers.

name: fertilizer bomb
description: This is a volatile homemade explosive.  Use this item to light the fuse.  You will, of course, need a lighter or matches in your inventory to do this.  Shortly after lighting the fuse, this item will explode, so get away!

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a source of fire!
use_action.msg: You light the %s.

name: fertilizer bomb (lit)
description: The fuse on this fertilizer bomb is lit and hissing.  It'll explode any moment now.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the %s, try throwing it instead.

name: Doppler Radar Turbo 2000
description: A briefcase with built-in laptop that looks like it's from the 80s.  Its vintage monochrome monitor displays a plethora of meteorological data.  No sign of the FLDSMDFR, however.

name: thermometer
description: A plastic thermometer that can read the air temperature.

name: hygrometer
description: A plastic hygrometer that can read the relative humidity in the air.

name: barometer
description: A plastic barometer that can read the atmospheric pressure.

name: tanning leather hide
description: A treated animal hide which is undergoing the chemical processes required to become leather.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The tanning leather hide isn't done yet.
use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the tanning leather hide and shake it clean.

name: tanning fur pelt
description: A treated animal pelt which is undergoing the chemical processes required to become fur.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The tanning fur pelt isn't done yet.
use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the tanning fur pelt and shake it clean.

name: wool staple
description: The natural cluster of wool fibres.  Could be processed to the felt patches or yarns.

name: lobotomizer
description: This is a hand-forged collapsible tool that has two axe heads and sharp shovel-like tip on one end.  It can be used as a shovel, or you could chop some zombies with it instead.

name: survivor machete
description: This common gardening tool has been customized and rebalanced to improve its performance as a weapon.

name: diamond rapier
description: The point of this rapier has been coated with diamond-like carbon, rendering it far more deadly.

name: diamond broadsword
description: This broadsword's edge has been coated with razor-sharp diamond-like carbon, making you the deadliest knight in the realm.  Your blademaster would be proud.

name: diamond zweihnder
description: This zweihander's blade has been coated in diamond-like carbon, making it pack even more of a punch.

name: diamond wakizashi
description: The edge of this wakizashi's blade has been coated with diamond-like carbon, making it as strong as, well, diamonds.

name: diamond nodachi
description: This nodachi's massive blade has been coated in diamond-like carbon, making it far more deadly.

name: remote vehicle controller
description: A remote controller for real cars.  Can turn onboard devices on and off.  Some cars can be driven remotely.

name: brick kiln
description: This is a portable charcoal-fired kiln.  It is designed for firing bricks, but you could use it to fire anything made of clay.

name: ANFO charge
description: This is a large plastic barrel filled with ANFO pellets and equipped with a dynamite primer.  Use this item to light the fuse.  You will then have twenty turns before it explodes and creates a large fireball

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a source of fire!
use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the ANFO charge.  Run survivor, run!

name: active ANFO charge
description: This is a large plastic barrel filled with ANFO pellets and equipped with a dynamite primer.  The fuse has been lit - better run like hell!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  run!

name: black gunpowder bomb
description: This is a tin can filled to the brim with black gunpowder and with a bit of fuse sticking out of it.

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a source of fire!
use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the black gunpowder bomb.  Throw it before it blows in your face!

name: active black gunpowder bomb
description: This is a tin can filled to the brim with black gunpowder and with a lit fuse stuck inside of it.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  throw it!

name: black gunpowder charge
description: This is a home-made explosive device, consisting of a large plastic jug filled with black gunpowder and scrap metal, equipped with a long fuse.  Use this item to light the fuse.  Should explode in no more than five turns...

use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the black gunpowder charge.  Get rid of it quickly!

name: active black gunpowder charge
description: This is a home-made explosive device, consisting of a large plastic jug filled with black gunpowder and scrap metal, whose fuse has been lit, its final countdown starting.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  run!

name: RDX sand bomb
description: This is a steel pipe, containing a mixture of RDX and sand, the former propelling the latter into a deadly mist of vicious shrapnel.  Use this item to light the fuse.

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a source of fire!
use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the sand bomb.  Throw it!

name: active RDX sand bomb
description: This is a steel pipe, containing a mixture of RDX and sand, the former propelling the latter into a deadly mist of vicious shrapnel.  The fuse has been lit, so why are you still holding it?

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  what are you waiting for?

name: RDX charge
description: This is an aluminium keg, filled with 50 litres worth of RDX and scrap metal.  Contains a core of primary explosive to ensure that the charge detonates completely and delivers its entire destructive power to everything in sight.

use_action.msg: You light the fuse on the explosive charge.  Clear the area!

name: active RDX charge
description: This is an aluminium keg, filled with 50 litres worth of RDX and scrap metal.  The fuse has been lit and once it ignites the primary explosive, the charge will detonate and rain fire and steel on everything in sight.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  clear the area immediately!

name: rocket candy
description: A pear-shaped chunk of rocket candy obtained by heating saltpetre with sugar and casting the obtained liquid.  Can serve as a rocket fuel, but also as a smokescreen  if you lit the narrow end, you should be able to throw it before the flame reaches the broad end.

use_action.msg: You light the rocket candy on fire.  Throw it!

name: burning rocket candy
description: This is a chunk of rocket candy that has been lit on fire and burns with a loud hiss, spewing forth large amounts of smoke.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the fuse  get rid of it immediately!

name: flute

descriptions: You play a little tune on your flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your flute.
You play a piece on your flute that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: A simple silver-plated flute.

name: clarinet

descriptions: You play a little tune on your clarinet.
You play a moving, orchestral piece on your clarinet.
You play an uplifting marching tune on your clarinet.

description: An ornate clarinet made from wood.

name: trumpet

descriptions: You play a little tune on your trumpet.
You play a slow, mourning piece on your trumpet.
You play a little ballad on your trumpet.

description: A brass-plated trumpet with only a few dents here and there.

name: ukulele

descriptions: You play a little tune on your ukulele.
You play a cute little ditty on your ukulele.
You play a small jam on your ukulele.

description: A small factory made ukulele.  Looks to be in working condition.

name: banjo

descriptions: You play a little tune on your banjo.
You play a bluegrass tune on your banjo.
You play a quick, Southern ditty on your banjo.

description: A standard factory-made banjo.  Looks to be in working condition.

name: violin

descriptions: You play a little tune on your violin.
You play a beautiful orchestral piece on your violin.
You play a quick, southern ditty on your fiddle.

description: A cheap, factory-made violin with a built-in holder for a bow.  Still produces a nice sound.

name: golden fiddle

descriptions: You play a quick, folksy tune on your fiddle.
As you pull the bow across its strings, it makes an evil hiss.
You play a tune so fierce, it feels like hell's broke loose.

description: A shiny golden fiddle, with a strange aura around it.  You feel like it once belonged to the best there's ever been.

name: stepladder
description: This is a wooden stepladder.  Use it to set it down.

name: ice axe
description: This is an ice axe with hammer on its head, a multi-purpose hiking and climbing tool used by mountaineers.  It is sturdy enough, so you can use it to pry open closed doors or lift manhole covers.

name: L-stick (off)
description: Produced by the Light corporation, this stylish staff not only functions as a light source, but doubles as a light-weight weapon, due to the superalloy materials it is made of.  Due to proprietary efficiency improvements over standard light sources, the l-stick or light stick as it is commonly called, batteries last longer than other light sources.

use_action.msg: The L-stick(tm) lights up.

name: L-stick (on)
description: Produced by the Light corporation, this stylish staff not only functions as a light source, but doubles as a light-weight weapon, due to the superalloy materials it is made of.  Due to proprietary efficiency improvements over standard light sources, the l-stick or light stick as it is commonly called, batteries last longer than other light sources.  The staff is glowing brightly, which is slowly draining the batteries

use_action.msg: The l-stick(tm)'s light fades away
